queries.description: AWS CloudFront distributions should have logging enabled to collect all viewer requests, which means the attribute 'logging_config' should be defined

files.expected_value: aws_cloudfront_distribution[site].logging_config should be defined

queries.description: All AWS CloudFront distributions should be integrated with the Web Application Firewall (AWS WAF) service

files.expected_value: 'web_acl_id'  should exist

queries.query_name: IAM policy allows for data exfiltration
queries.description: This policy contains actions that can retrieve information unrestricted and could lead to data exfiltration

files.expected_value: 'aws_iam_policy_document[lambda_s3].statement.actions' shouldn't contain illegal actions

queries.description: Server Access Logging should be enabled on S3 Buckets so that all changes are logged and trackable

files.expected_value: 'Resources.TofuStateBucket.Properties' should have property 'LoggingConfiguration'

queries.description: Server Access Logging should be enabled on S3 Buckets so that all changes are logged and trackable

files.expected_value: 'logging' should be defined and not null
'logging' should be defined and not null

queries.query_name: S3 Bucket with Unsecured CORS Rule
queries.description: If the CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) rule is defined in an S3 bucket, it should be secure

files.expected_value: 'cors_rule' to not allow all methods, all headers or several origins
files.actual_value: 'cors_rule' allows all methods, all headers or several origins

queries.description: IAM Access Analyzer should be enabled and configured to continuously monitor resource permissions

files.expected_value: 'AWS::AccessAnalyzer::Analyzer' should be set

queries.query_name: Lambda Function Without Dead Letter Queue
queries.description: AWS Lambda Function should be configured for a Dead Letter Queue(DLQ)

files.expected_value: 'aws_lambda_function[functions].dead_letter_config' should be defined and not null

queries.description: AWS Lambda functions should have TracingConfig enabled. For this, property 'tracing_Config.mode' should have the value 'Active'

files.expected_value: aws_lambda_function[functions].tracing_config should be defined and not null

queries.description: Lambda permission may be misconfigured if the action field is not filled in by 'lambda:InvokeFunction'

files.expected_value: [appsync_lambda].policy should be misconfigured
files.actual_value: [appsync_lambda].policy allows access to function (unqualified ARN) and its sub-resources, add another statement with ":*" to function name

queries.query_name: S3 Bucket Without Enabled MFA Delete
queries.description: S3 bucket without MFA Delete Enabled. MFA delete cannot be enabled through Terraform, it can be done by adding a MFA device (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/id_credentials_mfa_enable.html) and enabling versioning and MFA delete by using AWS CLI: 'aws s3api put-bucket-versioning --versioning-configuration=Status=Enabled,MFADelete=Enabled --bucket=<BUCKET_NAME> --mfa=<MFA_SERIAL_NUMBER>'. Please, also notice that MFA delete can not be used with lifecycle configurations

files.expected_value: 'versioning_configuration.mfa_delete' should be defined and not null

queries.description: S3 bucket notifications provide alerts triggered when certain operations are performed, which might be a helpful indicator for detecting unintended operations that might compromise your infrastructure or even malicious activity.

files.expected_value: 'aws_s3_bucket_notification' should be defined and not null

queries.description: AWS Shield Advanced should be used for Amazon Route 53 hosted zone, AWS Global Accelerator accelerator, Elastic IP Address, Elastic Load Balancing, and Amazon CloudFront Distribution to protect these resources against robust DDoS attacks

files.expected_value: aws_cloudfront_distribution has shield advanced associated
files.actual_value: aws_cloudfront_distribution does not have shield advanced associated
